question: Get top 5 customers by revenue
sql: SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;

question: Show total transaction amount per year
sql: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) AS year, SUM(amount) AS total FROM transactions GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;

question: Find customers with no transactions in 2024
sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) = 2024);

question: Get average transaction amount per account type
sql: SELECT a.account_type, AVG(t.amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.id GROUP BY a.account_type;

question: List all accounts with negative balance
sql: SELECT id, customer_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;

question: Count transactions above $1000 in each category
sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS high_value_txns FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 GROUP BY category ORDER BY high_value_txns DESC;

question: Get monthly revenue for 2023
sql: SELECT TO_CHAR(transaction_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, SUM(amount) AS revenue FROM transactions WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) = 2023 GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;

question: Get customers who made more than 10 transactions
sql: SELECT customer_id FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
